nodes.text: The  species of the The Magys were a sentient species that resided within the Unknown Regions and hailed from the planet Sunrise.

The species homeworld of Sunrise was devastated in a civil war, which was orchestrated by Haplif of the Agbui under the orders of the Grysk Jixtus. This caused the Magys and two hundred refugees to flee into a starship, where they would come across the planet Rapacc, homeworld of the Paccosh, who gave shelter to the refugees. The Magys, believing that her world was destroyed, wished for her and her people to die in order to pass on to the Beyond in order to heal it.
